summary: This is an email from an FBI agent forwarding a December 2019 prosecutorial memo regarding a co-conspirator investigation. The email specifically references page 62, which details meetings with the co-conspirator's counsel, beginning with information about an attorney meeting with GM's attorneys.

events.title: Drafting of Co-conspirator Prosecutorial Memo
events.description: A prosecutorial memorandum regarding a co-conspirator investigation was drafted.

events.title: Email Forwarding Co-conspirator Memo
events.description: An FBI agent sent an email forwarding the December 2019 co-conspirator prosecutorial memo, highlighting page 62 concerning meetings with counsel.

keyFacts: A prosecutorial memo concerning a co-conspirator investigation was drafted in December 2019.
The email highlights page 62 of the memo, which details meetings with the co-conspirator's legal counsel.
The meetings discussed began with information regarding an attorney meeting with the attorneys of an individual referred to as 'GM'.
The document is internal FBI correspondence forwarding a sensitive legal memo, indicating ongoing investigative or prosecutorial activity related to the Epstein case.
